bml.speech:
tmp/from-fml-apml.pho
Thank you for waiting. Here is your result.
I think eye-contact was good. If you can handle eye-contact, you can tell how strongly you want to ask them to do it . So that should be good communication!
It will be better communication when you pay a little bit more attention to facial-expression.You can tell how you are feeling specifically, which makes the conversation confortable for you and the interlocutor.If you think the improving facial-expression seems diffcult, I advise you to make troubled face by lowering the outer end of eyebrows.
This is the end of SST session. Thank you for joining. To do another session, please restart the system.
